p: For comparison, the effective mass of electron such as silicon (Si) and gallium arsenide (GaAs) are 0.26 and 0.12 me [ 24], respectively. The effective mass (EM) of the electron is low for TlGaTe 2 compared to Si. Thus, TlGaTe 2 has high electron mobility than silicon, which would be useful for an efficient solar cells [ 25].
